TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FrameStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the frame style of the selected control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint.DrawReversibleFrame%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint.DrawReversibleFrame%2A> is used when selecting objects or during drag-and-drop operations.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the FrameStyle enumeration. To run the example, paste the following code in a form called Form1 containing several controls.This example assumes the MouseDown, MouseMove, and MouseUp events are connected to the event-handler methods defined in the example.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.RectangleToScreen#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.f_13_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.RectangleToScreen#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.f_13_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.RectangleToScreen#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.f_13_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.FrameStyle Dashed = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.FrameStyle Thick = int32(1)
